name: Tap N Merge Tournament
description:
"Welcome “Tap N Merge - Tournaments” to the world!
A Brand New Number Merge game where you can win Real Cash Prizes!
Simple gameplay with deep strategy that anyone can enjoy!

Tap to move and merge matching blocks, earning points!
Keep merging blocks as fast as you can, before the board fills up!
Use strategy and fast pacing to be a winner!


How to play?
• Tap to select and move blocks to an empty space!
• Merge at least 3 blocks with the same number to create a more valuable block!
• Blocks must have an open path through empty tiles. Try not to barricade the path.
• Short format tournaments take about 2 minutes to play!
• Complete a GOAL to earn HUGE bonus points!
• The game ends early when the board fills up.

Simple yet challenging!
• Failing to merge blocks will cause new blocks to populate the game board.
• Earn big bonus scores and time by making large merges and combos!
• Think carefully and fast!

Compete with others and win prizes!
• Challenge people from all around the world.
• The player who finishes with the most points wins!
